title: Orgulho e Paix√£o
overview: Set in 1910, the plot takes place in the fictional Coffee Valley and tells the story of Elisabeta, woman ahead of her time, with dreams and ambitions completely different for a young woman for the period. She is encouraged by her father Felisberto to realize her dreams. Elisabeta lives with four other sisters, each with a different personality. She will have a turnaround in her life when she meets Darcy, with whom they will share a great passion. Inspired by the novels by Jane Austen.
